welcome_message_body: Welcome to Takamatsu, the beautiful port city known for its stunning Ritsurin Garden and delicious Sanuki udon noodles. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Menou (麺王)
restaurants.description: Menou (麺王) is a ramen restaurant located in 高松市.
restaurants.address: 寿町1-1 (高松ステーションホテル 1F), 高松市, 香川県, 760-0023
